paper_abstract: The empirical research presented in this paper corroborated that the managerial capabilities of IT executives fully mediate the effect of IT governance on enterprise adaptability, and indirectly mediate the effect of business governance through its direct effect on IT governance. It also showed that IT and business executives hold different views about the two respective governance systems. Organizations therefore should emphasize the development of IT executives' managerial capabilities in order to achieve IT-enabled enterprise adaptability.
paper_title: From Governance to Adaptability: The Mediating Effect of IT Executives' Managerial Capabilities
